Name: Tuxedo Cocktail No.1 (Savoy & Duffy's recipe)
Instructions: Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
REGAL STIR all ingredients (including lemon zest).
Review: Bone dry with faint anise and liquorice notes from the absinthe.
History: Adapted from recipes in The Savoy Cocktail Book (1930) by Harry Craddock and The Official Mixer's Manual (1934 & 1940) by Patrick Gavin Duffy. Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
